arts.ttl: Serie A Liveblog: Milan vs. Como, Torino vs. Empoli, Udinese vs. Verona, Monza vs. Parma
Monza vs Parma, a real six-pointer
arts.sum: Parma are the opponent that Monza have faced most at home without ever losing between Serie A and B: 10 wins and six draws in 16 previous matches (the only one this century was a 1-1 in March 2022 in Serie B). The home side put in a good performance against Inter but now must win in order to climb up the table: they have only gained one point in their last eight games, and they will need more points to be able to stay in the Serie A Enilive.
There are still just three points separating Serie A's top three ahead of Week 29 and Steve Davies has predictions for all 10 games in the Italian top-flight.

Monza are coming off a crazy game in Milan last weekend, as they unexpectedly found themselves 2-0 up at half time, before conceding a comeback defeat to the Nerazzurri. On the other hand, Mateo Pell...

arts.ttl: Preview: Monza vs. Parma - prediction, team news, lineups
